mapper.insert: insert into alarmlist ( alarm_no, alarm_title, alarm_type, mem_id, rmem_id, alarm_content_no ) values ( seq_alno.nextval, #{alarmTitle}, #{alarmType}, #{memId}, #{rmemId}, #{alarmContentNo} )
mapper.select: select alarm_no , a.mem_id , alarm_title , alarm_type , git_nick , rmem_id , alarm_content_no , alarm_yn from alarmlist a join member m on (a.mem_id = m.mem_id) where a.status = 'Y' and rmem_id = #{memId} order by alarm_no desc
select alarm_no , a.mem_id , alarm_type , alarm_content_no from alarmlist
mapper.update: update member set team='0' , team_status='N' where mem_id=#{proWriter}
mapper.select: select mem_id from member where team = #{team} and status = 'Y'
select alarm_type from alarmlist where mem_id = #{memId} and alarm_type = 'zoom' and status ='Y'
select sum(alarm_yn) from alarmlist where rmem_id = #{memId} and status = 'Y'
